iwork.eheap2
Interface EventHeapConfigValues

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventHeap, SecureEventHeap
public interface EventHeapConfigValues

This is an interface that contains members with the default settings for the Event Heap

Field Summary
static int EHEAP2_DEFAULT_PORT
          The default port of the Event Heap server on the machine the server runs on.
static int EHEAP2_DEFAULT_SECURE_PORT
           
static java.lang.Integer EVENT_HEAP_VERSION
          The version of the Event Heap.
 

Field Detail

EVENT_HEAP_VERSION

public static final java.lang.Integer EVENT_HEAP_VERSION
The version of the Event Heap. Note, that this changes only when incompatibilities between versions are introduced. Version 1 = First full Java version that used TSpaces (Fall, 2000) Version 2 = First non-TSpaces version (Summer, 2001)

EHEAP2_DEFAULT_PORT

public static final int EHEAP2_DEFAULT_PORT
The default port of the Event Heap server on the machine the server runs on. Can be passed to the EventHeap class constructor.
